Trump Campaign Filming at Arlington Cemetery Dismayed Family of Green Beret  —  The family of a Green Beret buried there expressed concern about videos and photos taken by his grave.  And a cemetery employee declined to press charges after an altercation with the Trump team, fearing retribution.

Trump aide ‘abruptly pushed aside’ an Arlington National Cemetery employee during commemoration, official says  —  The incident occurred when the Trump aide sought to take photos and video at Section 60, the officials said.  No charges were filed and the Army considers the matter closed.
